testcase.name: testingConnection
testcase.system-out: Hibernate: create table Academic_unit (Academic_id bigserial not null, academic_code bigint, academic_name varchar(255), parent_id bigint, type varchar(255) check (type in ('Programme','Faculty','Department')), primary key (Academic_id)) Hibernate: create table Assistant (assistant_id bigserial not null, first_name varchar(50), last_name varchar(50), teacher_id integer, primary key (assistant_id)) Hibernate: create table Course (course_code varchar(50) not null, course_name varchar(50), department_id bigint, semester_id integer, primary key (course_code)) Hibernate: create table Course_Definition (course_definition_code varchar(50) not null, course_definition_description varchar(50), course_id varchar(50), primary key (course_definition_code)) Hibernate: create table Semester (sem_id serial not null, end_date date, semester_name varchar(50), starting_date date, primary key (sem_id)) Hibernate: create table Student (student_id serial not null, date_of_birth timestamp(6), first_name varchar(255), last_name varchar(255), primary key (student_id)) Hibernate: create table student_course (registration_id integer not null, course_id varchar(50) not null, primary key (registration_id, course_id)) Hibernate: create table Student_Registration (reg_id serial not null, department varchar(255) check (department in ('Programme','Faculty','Department')), registration_code varchar(50), registration_date timestamp(6), semester_id integer, student_id integer, primary key (reg_id)) Hibernate: create table Teacher (teacher_id serial not null, first_name varchar(50), last_name varchar(50), qualification varchar(50) check (qualification in ('MASTER','PHD','PROFESSOR')), course_id varchar(50), primary key (teacher_id)) Hibernate: alter table if exists Course_Definition drop constraint if exists UK_dwcuqnwnqj4ca7ir7jyqsuxyj Hibernate: alter table if exists Course_Definition add constraint UK_dwcuqnwnqj4ca7ir7jyqsuxyj unique (course_id) Hibernate: alter table if exists Student_Registration drop constraint if exists UK_ovhp980konqxnkuxgyto4d9n5 Hibernate: alter table if exists Student_Registration add constraint UK_ovhp980konqxnkuxgyto4d9n5 unique (semester_id) Hibernate: alter table if exists Assistant add constraint FKhthljc23kq4amt3shjf4nskf1 foreign key (teacher_id) references Teacher Hibernate: alter table if exists Course add constraint FK4d8ky12iexb7mi7uf4r5cebkx foreign key (department_id) references Academic_unit Hibernate: alter table if exists Course add constraint FKft9mu2p1fcyug4k996696keml foreign key (semester_id) references Semester Hibernate: alter table if exists Course_Definition add constraint FKqbl8gor5odevn1j9jffr9xcg7 foreign key (course_id) references Course Hibernate: alter table if exists student_course add constraint FKtao0ysp4xfmi9dlxc10ku58qq foreign key (course_id) references Course Hibernate: alter table if exists student_course add constraint FKc0auj4c510c5n9jai1ojsdyqr foreign key (registration_id) references Student_Registration Hibernate: alter table if exists Student_Registration add constraint FK3demavudptwtpg1jyrpdhifo7 foreign key (semester_id) references Semester Hibernate: alter table if exists Student_Registration add constraint FK2r1utrt206ap5pex0tqtu678n foreign key (student_id) references Student Hibernate: alter table if exists Teacher add constraint
